DOC.detailed_description: At least 10 percent patient low CD4 count HIV infection develop meningitis due Cryptococcus neoformans . More effective treatment standard therapy need explore . Patients select randomization process take amphotericin B intravenously ( vein ) , 14 day , either placebo ( ineffective substance ) flucytosine 14 day . Then patient select randomization process take either ( 1 ) fluconazole total 8 week plus itraconazole placebo ; ( 2 ) itraconazole total 8 week plus fluconazole placebo .
